activities: RealPage, Inc. serves as a data processor for the residential rental sector of the real estate industry. Our clients serve as data controllers that direct the processing and handling of all personal data collected. We collected personal data related to residential lease transactions, rental payment processing, and related services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We collect and process our client's data, including but not limited to: name, address, date of birth, government identification number, and financial account information.
